metadata.reset:
Z-Wave Factory Reset
1- On the Home Screen menu of your Webee TV app, select Settings, then navigate to the Developer section to access the Z-Wave console
2- Select "Factory Reset". This will remove all Z-Wave devices from your Smartee.

Important: Note that this procedure will remove ALL Z-Wave devices from the controller.

Hub Factory Reset 
1- To factory reset Smartee contact customer support at support@webeelife.com and request a MAC reset.
2- Only after MAC reset is processed, navigate to the Home Screen menu of your Webee TV app, select Settings, and navigate to the System section.
3- On the Left Panel select "Backup & Reset". Then on the Right Panel select "Factory Data Reset".
4- Tap on "Reset device" to complete the reset.

IMPORTANT: Do not reset your Smartee without previous consent of the Webee support team and only if the controller is inoperable.
